synopsis.text: Minori is an office worker who frequently argues with her boss, Akihiko Hadano. After a late night company party, they miss the last train home and have to spend the night at a capsule hotel. Due to a mix-up, they end up having to share a small capsule room intended for one person. Being in such close quarters leads to rising sexual tension between Minori and Akihiko. They give in to their attraction and intimacy ensues. This story explores an unexpected romantic connection blossoming from a work relationship.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
